name: blue-scarf
effect: Held: Increases the holder’s Beauty during a Super Contest’s Visual Competition.
short_effect: Raises the holder’s Beauty while in a contest.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the “Beauty” aspect of the holder in a Contest.
flavor_text.platinum: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the “Beauty” aspect of the holder in a Contest.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the “Beauty” aspect of the holder in a Contest in Sinnoh.
